\documentclass[11pt, a4paper]{article} 

\usepackage[T1]{fontenc} 
\usepackage[british]{babel}  
\usepackage[left = 0mm, right = 0mm, top = 0mm, bottom = 0mm]{geometry}
\usepackage{graphicx} 
\usepackage{xcolor}  
\usepackage{ragged2e}
\usepackage{lato} 
\usepackage{pdfbase}

\begin{filecontents*}{CompanyIcon.64}

\end{filecontents*}

\begin{filecontents*}{MapIcon.64}

\end{filecontents*}

\begin{filecontents*}{PhoneIcon.64}

\end{filecontents*}

\end{filecontents*}

\end{filecontents*}

\begin{filecontents*}{Website.64}

\end{filecontents*}

\renewcommand{\familydefault}{\sfdefault}

\definecolor{primary_blue}{HTML}{1B63BA}
\definecolor{secondary_text}{HTML}{535353}
\definecolor{background_blue}{HTML}{BDD1F6}

\usepackage[colorlinks = true, urlcolor = primary_blue, linkcolor = primary_blue]{hyperref}

\newcommand{\location}[1]{\mbox{\color{secondary_text}\includegraphics[width=7pt]{pin.png} #1}}
\newcommand{\type}[1]{{\small{\color{primary_blue}#1}}}
\newcommand{\dates}[1]{\hfill\mbox{\textit{\small{\color{primary_blue}#1}}}}
\newcommand{\is}{\par\vskip 0.5ex plus .4ex}
\newcommand{\headleft}[1]{\vspace{2ex}\textsc{\textbf{\color{primary_blue}#1}}\par\par}
\newcommand{\headright}[1]{\vspace*{2.5ex}\textit{\textbf{\large\color{primary_blue}#1}}\par\vspace*{-2ex}{\color{primary_blue}\hrulefill}\par}
\newcommand{\titlerole}[1]{\textbf{\small{#1}}}

\renewcommand\UrlFont{\normalfont}

\begin{document}

\setlength{\topskip}{0pt}
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}
\setlength{\fboxsep}{0pt}
\pagestyle{empty}
\raggedbottom

\begin{minipage}[t]{0.33\textwidth}
\colorbox{primary_blue}{\begin{minipage}[t][5mm][t]{\textwidth}\null\hfill\null\end{minipage}}

\vspace{-.2ex}
\colorbox{background_blue!90}{
    \color{secondary_text}
    
    \kern0.07\textwidth\relax
    \begin{minipage}[t][293mm][t]{0.82\textwidth}
    \raggedright
    \vspace*{2.5ex}
    
    \color{black}
    \immediate\write18{base64 -d CompanyIcon.64 > CompanyIcon.pdf}
    \includegraphics[width=12pt]{CompanyIcon.pdf} \raisebox{0.5ex}{[[profile.company]]}\vspace{0.4ex} \\

    \immediate\write18{base64 -d MapIcon.64 > MapIcon.pdf}
    \includegraphics[width=12pt]{MapIcon.pdf} \raisebox{0.5ex}{[[profile.location]]}\vspace{0.4ex} \\

    \immediate\write18{base64 -d PhoneIcon.64 > PhoneIcon.pdf}
    \includegraphics[width=12pt]{PhoneIcon.pdf} \raisebox{0.5ex}{\href{tel:[[profile.phone]]}{[[profile.phone]]}}\vspace{0.4ex} \\

    \immediate\write18{base64 -d MailIcon.64 > MailIcon.pdf}
    \includegraphics[width=12pt]{MailIcon.pdf} \raisebox{0.5ex}{\href{mailto:[[profile.email]]}{[[profile.email]]}}\vspace{0.4ex} \\

    \immediate\write18{base64 -d LinkedinIcon.64 > LinkedinIcon.pdf}
    \includegraphics[width=12pt]{LinkedinIcon.pdf} \raisebox{0.5ex}{\href{https://[[profile.linkedin]]}{[[profile.linkedin]]}\vspace{0.4ex}} \\

    \immediate\write18{base64 -d GithubIcon.64 > GithubIcon.pdf}
    \includegraphics[width=12pt]{GithubIcon.pdf} \raisebox{0.5ex}{\href{https://[[profile.github]]}{[[profile.github]]}}\vspace{0.4ex} \\
    
    \immediate\write18{base64 -d Website.64 > Website.pdf}
    \includegraphics[width=12pt]{Website.pdf} \raisebox{0.5ex}{\href{https://[[profile.website]]}{[[profile.website]]}}\vspace{0.4ex} \\
    
    \color{secondary_text}
    \begin{justify}
    \headleft{SUMMARY}\textit{[[cv.summary]]}
    \end{justify}
    \vspace{-2ex}
    
    %% -------------------------------------------------------
    %% SKILLS
    [[$ if cv.skills $]]
        \headleft{SKILLS}
        \vspace{-2ex}
        \begin{justify}
            [[$ for skill in cv.skills $]][[skill]] \textcolor{white}{•} [[$ endfor $]]
        \end{justify}
        \vspace{-2ex}
    [[$ endif $]]
    %% -------------------------------------------------------
    %% LANGUAGES
    [[$ if cv.languages $]]
        \headleft{LANGUAGES}
        [[$ for language in cv.languages $]]
            \textbf{[[language]]}%\hfill [[language.level]]\\
        [[$ endfor $]]
    [[$ endif $]]
    %% -------------------------------------------------------
    %% INTERESTS
    [[$ if cv.interests $]]
        \headleft{INTERESTS and RESEARCHES}
        [[$ for interest in cv.interests $]]
            [[interest]] \\
        [[$ endfor $]]
    [[$ endif $]]
    
    \end{minipage}\kern0.09\textwidth\relax
}
\end{minipage}
\hskip1.2em
\begin{minipage}[t]{0.62\textwidth}
\setlength{\parskip}{0.8ex}
\vspace{3ex}

%% -------------------------------------------------------
%% name and title 
\Huge\textbf{[[full_name]]}\normalsize \\
\large\textbf{[[cv.title]]}\normalsize 
%% -------------------------------------------------------
%% CARRIER
[[$ if cv.carriers $]]
    \headright{WORK EXPERIENCE}
    [[$ for carrier in cv.carriers $]]
        \location{[[carrier.location]]} \type{[[carrier.type]]} - \href{https://[[carrier.url]]}{[[carrier.url]]} \dates{[[carrier.starting]] to [[carrier.ending]]}  \\
        \titlerole{[[carrier.title]] | [[carrier.role]]} \\
        \small{[[carrier.description]]}
        \is
    [[$ endfor $]]
[[$ endif $]]
%% -------------------------------------------------------
%% PROJECTS
[[$ if cv.projects $]]
    \headright{PROJECTS}
    [[$ for project in cv.projects $]]
        \location{[[project.location]]} \type{[[project.type]]} - \href{https://[[project.url]]}{[[project.url]]} \dates{[[project.starting]] to [[project.ending]]} \\
        \titlerole{[[project.title]] | [[project.role]]} \\
        \small{[[project.description]]}
        \is
    [[$ endfor $]]
[[$ endif $]]
%% -------------------------------------------------------
%% EDUCATION
[[$ if cv.educations $]]
    \headright{EDUCATION}
    [[$ for education in cv.educations $]]
        \location{[[education.location]]} - \type{[[education.type]]} - \href{https://[[education.url]]}{[[education.url]]} \dates{[[education.starting]] to [[education.ending]]} \\
        \titlerole{[[education.title]] | [[education.role]]} \\
        \small{[[education.description]]}
        \is
    [[$ endfor $]]
[[$ endif $]]

\end{minipage}
\end{document}
